# File Reader Tool

<Intro />

## Tool details
**Tool ID:** `file_reader_tool`

**Tool description:** Finds and reads content from a local file on Disk

**Args schema:**
```json
{

  "properties": {
    "filename": {

      "title": "Filename",
      "type": "string"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "filename"
  ],

  "type": "object"
}
```

**Output schema:**
